Constructor Detail

Board

public Board(int width,
             int height,
             int nob,
             Minesweeper m)
Constructs a new Board using width, height, bomb count, and the Minesweeper creating it

Parameters:
width - the width in cells of the Board
height - the height in cells of the Board
nob - the number of bombs to create
m - the Minesweeper that created it
See Also:
Gameplay

Replaces a cell with a different kind of cell

Parameters:
cellNumber - the unique ID of the cell to replace
type - the type of cell to replace it with
